snippet.title: POMBERO: Lord of the Night - PS4 Launch Trailer PS4 | PS5
snippet.description:
You are a journalist who has lost his mother in strange circumstances. All this will drive you to the brink of madness when you come face to face with the Lord of the Night and discover your terrible past with Nazi Germany.

Exclusive to PlayStation for a limited time.

Store on PlayStation:
https://store.playstation.com/es-py/concept/10007606
